prompt.task: Analyze the extracted AWS architecture diagram and validate its correctness.
prompt.instructions: 1. Identify AWS services used (EC2, Lambda, S3, etc.). 2. Verify architectural consistency and best practices. 3. Ensure that security and scalability considerations are met.
prompt.output: AWS Diagram Validation: [Valid/Invalid] Identified Services: [List of AWS services] Architecture Issues: [List of detected issues] Recommendations: [Suggested improvements]
